Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute near Cicero/14th
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses rtd NB Cicero, Roosevelt, Kostner, Harrison & Cicero: SB via Cicero, Lexington, Kostner, Harrison & Cicero due to street blockage nr Cicero/14th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Cicero/14th.

  • Northbound buses will operate via Cicero, Roosevelt, Kostner, Harrison, then resume their normal route on Cicero.
  • Southbound buses will operate via Cicero, Lexington, Kostner, Harrison, then resume their normal route on Cicero.

Allow extra travel time.
